original_title: All-American: The MMA Debut of Chris Weidman
overview: Before he became a UFC champion, Chris Weidman began his journey into MMA with his coach and mentor Ray Longo by his side. Originally filmed in 2009, this documentary shows how this young wrestler from Long Island took his first steps into the world of fighting, a place that would forever change the outcome of his life.
title: All-American: The MMA Debut of Chris Weidman
